short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns your homepage into a breathtaking gallery of exhilarating global images. ExtremeNewTab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Extreme New Tab" â€“ Elevate your browsing experience to new heights with adrenaline-pumping visuals right at your fingertips! This dynamic Chrome extension transforms your new tab page into a thrilling adventure by showcasing breathtaking pictures of extreme sports. Dive into the world of skydiving, rock climbing, snowboarding, and more, as each tab opens to reveal stunning images that capture the heart-pounding excitement of extreme activities.
Plus, within the new tab, you'll discover convenient links to all of your favorite social media sites, a digital clock, and a date display.

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Extreme New Tab Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use. The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy Policy: https://anysol-providers.com/Privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://anysol-providers.com/Terms-of-use/

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall

All Pictures are taken from Unsplash with a commercial license.
